programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: No Mercy, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: In this vengeance-fueled thriller, a martial arts champion will stop at nothing to find her missing younger sister --hunting down the predators that kidnapped and assaulted her one by one.

programme.title: The Villainess, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Baby Assassins, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Chisato and Mahilo are two high school girls who are about to graduate. They also happen to both be highly skilled assassins. When the organization they work for orders them to share a room, the relationship between turns sour.

programme.title: Baby Assassins 2, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After the agency suspends its top assassins, aspiring hitmen decide to eliminate them—leading to a lightning-fast showdown between trained killers.

programme.title: Bad City, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: In poverty-stricken Kaiko City, a corrupt mayoral candidate eliminates rival mafias, prompting a released ex-cop to lead a treacherous battle for justice with a special task force in the gritty underworld.

programme.title: One-Percent Warrior, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movie—on turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japan’s deadliest martial arts assassin.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of detectives investigate a murder while pursuing their other full-time professions. Welcome to Hollywood Homicide - the only place where you can come to work hungry, horny, thirsty, and broke, and resolve all four by the end of the watch.

programme.title: Baywatch, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: When a dangerous crime wave hits the beach, Lt. Mitch Buchannon (Dwayne Johnson) leads his elite squad of badass lifeguards, including hot-shot recruit Matt Brody (Zac Efron), on a mission to prove you don't have to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Summer Rental, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: This routine comedy is about a series of misadventures during a family vacation at the beach and stars John Candy (who died of a heart attack while filming in Mexico in 1994) as John Chester and Karen Austin as his long-suffering wife Sandy.

programme.title: Surfer, Dude, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Longboarding soul surfer Steve Addington (Matthew McConaughey) returns to Malibu for the summer to find his cool hometown vibe corrupted.

programme.title: Baywatch, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: When a dangerous crime wave hits the beach, Lt. Mitch Buchannon (Dwayne Johnson) leads his elite squad of badass lifeguards, including hot-shot recruit Matt Brody (Zac Efron), on a mission to prove you don't have to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, and Shannen Doherty star in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the `80s.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Untamed Heart, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Two of today's hottest young actors, Christian Slater and Marisa Tomei, star in this tender romance about lonely souls destined to find one another. Co-starring Rosie Perez.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins star in this powerful story of a young woman haunted by her father's past and the shadow of her own future. Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning play, PROOF also stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Hope Davis.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.desc: As Harry Burns and Sally Albright build their lives and careers in Manhattan, their paths continue to cross and their friendship continues to grow … until they confront the decision whether to let their friendship develop into romance.

programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Zodiac, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the Robert Graysmith books about the real life notorious Zodiac, a serial killer who terrorized San Francisco with a string of seemingly random murders during the 1960s and 1970s.

programme.title: The Net, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock, Dennis Miller and Jeremy Northam star in this hit thriller about a computer expert whose life is "erased" by a computer conspiracy. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)

programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Ranger, The Cook And A Hole In The Sky, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In 1919, a cocky sophomore in the forest service has to learn life the hard way.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: The Spirit, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: In the vein of BATMAN BEGINS and SIN CITY, THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Open Water, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: When a couple is stranded while scuba diving, they soon realize they are in the middle of shark-infested waters in this intense, critically acclaimed thriller.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Big screen version of the trend-setting 1960s television series, contemporizing the premise for the '90s. A trio of juvenile delinquents become undercover cops to infiltrate a drug ring in the ultra-hip L.A. club scene.

programme.title: Air Force One, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When Russian neo-nationalists hijack Air Force One, the world's most secure aircraft, the President is faced with the decision to give in to terrorist demands or sacrifice the country's dignity and the lives of his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: XXX, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Xander Cage is a notorious underground thrill-seeker deemed untouchable by the law. But when NSA Agent Gibbsons convinces Cage to infiltrate a ruthless Russian crime ring, this new breed of secret agent takes down the enemies of justice with a vengeance.

programme.title: Forrest Gump, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks gives an astonishing performance as Forrest, an everyman whose simple innocence comes to embody a generation.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start all bets are off!

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Desperate to revive his career, Dickie tries to audition for a role in Rob Reiner's new movie but the director doesn't believe Dickie is normal enough to play the part.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In this raucous comedy, Parker Posey ("Scream 3") stars as a hard-partying NY club girl who takes a job as a librarian.

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt, and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

programme.title: The Return of Swamp Thing, (1989, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: NEW HD TRANSFER. Everyone's favorite muck-encrusted plant-man falls in love with Dr. Arcane's sexy daughter and must rescue her from her father's nefarious and murderous plans.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: Alone, (2020, Zombies)
programme.desc: During a global pandemic, a man must battle swarming hordes of the undead to rescue a female neighbor. This zombie horror tale stars Tyler Posey, Summer Spiro, and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: Mom and Dad, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her little brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Crawl, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. With the storm intensifying and water levels rising, the pair face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a Los Angeles policeman who recently lost his wife and has been acting increasingly unstable. Danny Glover plays a homicide detective with an impeccable record and a loving family. Now the two are stuck with each other as partners.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as a volatile pair of LAPD detectives. This time, the cops are unhappy with their assignment to baby-sit an accountant. But the mob wants the accountant dead—and is killing everyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Police officers Riggs (Mel Gibson) and Murtaugh (Danny Glover) team for the third time. This time, they must track down a crooked cop who has stolen weapons from the Los Angeles police depot.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)

programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitora’s Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences… And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 1), (1991, Western)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 2), (1991, Western)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron fight for control of their father's empire

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operações especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a missão de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga prisão. Lá, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres são reveladas, Steele percebe que eles estão presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok. Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: RedBad: A Invasão dos Francos
programme.desc: As lutas pelo poder e as guerras entre o Redbad Frisiano e seu inimigo jurado Pepin de Herstal, Senhor dos Francos.

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacável ex.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operações especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a missão de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga prisão. Lá, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres são reveladas, Steele percebe que eles estão presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok. Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: RedBad: A Invasão dos Francos
programme.desc: As lutas pelo poder e as guerras entre o Redbad Frisiano e seu inimigo jurado Pepin de Herstal, Senhor dos Francos.

programme.title: Confissões de um Filho
programme.desc: Confissões de um filho pródigo é uma versão moderna da história do filho pródigo que Jesus contou.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma história da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela é filha do Rei.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanças
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Pé Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, Pé Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incêndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentões encontram o Pé Grande, eles decidem capturá-lo e explorá-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o Pé Grande e devolvê-lo à sua casa.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanças
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Perseguido pelo Destino
programme.desc: Em um circuito de corridas, o gângster Gigi (Matthias Schoenaerts), membro de uma cruel gangue criminosa de Bruxelas, conhece a jovem e rica corredora Bibi (Adèle Exarchopoulos). Logo, os dois se apaixonam, mas por causa de suas vidas distintas, a chance de ficarem juntos é remota. Mesmo assim, eles iniciam um relacionamento pelo qual lutarão com unhas e dentes, mas que também colocará suas vidas em perigo.

programme.title: À Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqüestrada, que está agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda está viva. Em uma corrida terrível contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e até mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistério de seu desaparecimento e liberação do cativeiro

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: O Mistério Da Passagem Da Morte
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes norte-americanos viajam para Passagem de Dyatlov em busca de respostas sobre os eventos ocorridos na década de 1950, quando nove esquiadores russos morreram inexplicavelmente. Gravando um documentário, eles percorrem a trilha amaldiçoada dos Montes Urais e logo começam a desconfiar que não estão sozinhos no local.

programme.title: O Segredo da Floresta
programme.desc: Durante uma viagem romântica no interior da Índia, um casal de Los Angeles acidentalmente testemunha o exorcismo assustador de uma menina de 11 anos. Eles decidem resgatá-la.

programme.title: O Exorcismo de Karen Walker
programme.desc: Um casal descobre um dispositivo Kirlian em sua nova casa. Intrigados com o conceito de fotografar a aura das pessoas, eles, sem saber, liberam um mal antigo.

programme.title: Depois da Escuridão
programme.desc: Conforme o sol se apaga, uma família se reúne para enfrentar o fim do mundo, suas esperanças de resgate lentamente diminuem enquanto enfrentam conflitos entre si.

programme.title: História de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera (Sienna Miller), uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemático (Nick Matthews) entrar em seu apartamento. As coisas se complicam quando ele decide atacá-la

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

Mesmo assim, eles iniciam um relacionamento pelo qual lutarão com unhas e dentes, mas que também colocará suas vidas em perigo.

programme.title: Esquadrão Antissequestro
programme.desc: Gabriela (Gabriela Simoni), uma menina de onze anos, filha de um jogador de futebol, é sequestrada durante a Copa do Mundo por um grupo de terroristas.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: No Rastro da Violência
programme.desc: Fascinada pelas raízes do comportamento violento, a psicóloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.title: Profissão de Risco
programme.desc: Jack é contratado por Dragna, um chefão do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguirá abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida está em risco. Vários criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defendê-la se quiser viver.

programme.title: À Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqüestrada, que está agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda está viva. Em uma corrida terrível contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e até mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistério de seu desaparecimento e liberação do cativeiro

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacável ex.

programme.title: Esquadrão Antissequestro
programme.desc: Gabriela (Gabriela Simoni), uma menina de onze anos, filha de um jogador de futebol, é sequestrada durante a Copa do Mundo por um grupo de terroristas.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

Mas Jack nunca conseguirá abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida está em risco. Vários criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defendê-la se quiser viver.

programme.title: A Filha do Meu Melhor Amigo
programme.desc: A amizade duradoura entre as famílias Walling e Ostroff é testada quando Nina, a filha pródiga de Ostroff, volta para casa nas férias após uma ausência de cinco anos e inicia um caso com David, chefe da família Walling.

programme.title: Meet Bill
programme.desc: Um homem de meia-idade que está cansado de seu trabalho e tem de suportar a infidelidade de sua esposa aceita, com relutância, a tarefa de ser mentor de um adolescente rebelde.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Escândalos no Tabloide
programme.desc: Romance sobre o mundo sensacionalista dos tablóides britânicos. ''Atrás de cada foto há uma história... ''

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso dá errado, só restam três semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: Tempos Difíceis
programme.desc: A vila de Kilcoulin's Leap já foi uma próspera cidade termal e lar de um famoso Poço Sagrado, mas agora oferece pouco emprego para seu povo. Quando um grupo de amigos apresenta um plano para sequestrar um lote de Viagra e vendê-lo no mercado aberto, eles não contam com a resposta vigorosa dos fabricantes do Viagra. Em pânico, eles escondem a carga de Viagra no Poço Sagrado da cidade.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Mundo adulto
programme.desc: Amy acredita estar destinada a ser poeta e busca orientação com um escritor solitário.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Escândalos no Tabloide
programme.desc: Romance sobre o mundo sensacionalista dos tablóides britânicos. ''Atrás de cada foto há uma história... ''

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso dá errado, só restam três semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: Tempos Difíceis
programme.desc: A vila de Kilcoulin's Leap já foi uma próspera cidade termal e lar de um famoso Poço Sagrado, mas agora oferece pouco emprego para seu povo. Quando um grupo de amigos apresenta um plano para sequestrar um lote de Viagra e vendê-lo no mercado aberto, eles não contam com a resposta vigorosa dos fabricantes do Viagra. Em pânico, eles escondem a carga de Viagra no Poço Sagrado da cidade.

programme.title: A Jovem Rainha
programme.desc: Segue a vida de Cristina da Suécia, rainha coroada no país durante o século XVII. Criada rigorosamente como um príncipe, ela assume sua posição como líder e enfrenta grande resistência com suas ideias de modernizar a Suécia.

programme.title: Amor, Felicidade Ou Casamento
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais estão se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar à antiga.

programme.title: Albert Nobbs
programme.desc: Albert Nobbs luta para sobreviver na Irlanda do século 19, onde as mulheres não são incentivadas a serem independentes. Passando-se por homem para poder trabalhar como mordomo no hotel mais luxuoso de Dublin, Albert conhece um lindo pintor e tenta se livrar da farsa que tem vivido.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.title: Receitas do Amor
programme.desc: Depois de uma crítica negativa e uma palestra do chef Gordon Ramsay, um talentoso mas angustiado chef londrino transforma um pub country em um restaurante gourmet.

programme.title: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: Uma milionária mulher (Cate Blanchett) perde todo seu dinheiro e é obrigada a morar em São Francisco com sua irmã (Sally Hawkins) e os sobrinhos em uma casa bem modesta. Ela acaba encontrando um refinado homem (Peter Sarsgaard) que pode resolver seus problemas financeiros, mas antes precisa descobrir quem é e aceitar sua nova condição de vida.

programme.title: Diré tu Nombre
programme.desc: Miguel, un médico español, se pone en peligro para proporcionar tratamiento médico a las víctimas de las revueltas militares. Wren es portavoz de una organización que financia la asistencia médica a naciones empobrecidas de todo el mundo. Se conocen en Liberia, donde Wren queda inmediatamente impresionada por el desinterés, la habilidad médica y el encanto de Miguel. Ambos inician un tórrido romance, que deben aprender a compaginar con su importante trabajo.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar à antiga.

programme.title: Albert Nobbs
programme.desc: Albert Nobbs luta para sobreviver na Irlanda do século 19, onde as mulheres não são incentivadas a serem independentes. Passando-se por homem para poder trabalhar como mordomo no hotel mais luxuoso de Dublin, Albert conhece um lindo pintor e tenta se livrar da farsa que tem vivido.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.title: Receitas do Amor
programme.desc: Depois de uma crítica negativa e uma palestra do chef Gordon Ramsay, um talentoso mas angustiado chef londrino transforma um pub country em um restaurante gourmet.

programme.title: Jogada de Risco
programme.desc: John (John C. Reilly), um fracassado encalhado em Reno, está duro. É aí que chega Sydney, que fica com pena dele, paga um café da manhã e lhe dá algumas dicas sobre como ganhar dinheiro nos cassinos. Dois anos depois, John torna-se parceiro de Sydney.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados
programme.desc: As complicações surgem durante uma situação perigosa de refém em um restaurante.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Danielsnão demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: November Man: Um Espião Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Peter Devereaux é um agente da CIA que se afasta do ramo da espionagem, mas é trazido de volta depois de cinco anos quando é enviado para uma tarefa fora dos trâmites oficiais da CIA, mas percebe que há bem mais interesses por trás desta situação

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um túnel recém-construído.

programme.title: Soldado Universal 3: Regeneração
programme.desc: Um soldado ressuscitado e geneticamente modificado enfrenta seus inimigos, contratados por terroristas nucleares.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Danielsnão demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Aceleração Máxima
programme.desc: Uma mãe tem uma noite para fazer algumas tarefas em Los Angeles que exigem uma arma, se ela quiser ver seu filho vivo. Ele é mantido por um chefe da máfia.

programme.title: O Rei das Armas
programme.desc: Um criminoso se reúne com um velho amigo após uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados
programme.desc: As complicações surgem durante uma situação perigosa de refém em um restaurante.

programme.title: Desaparecidos
programme.desc: Alice Launey, uma especialista forense francesa ainda assombrada por seu passado, vem a Seul para apresentar seu trabalho. Ela conhecerá JinHo, um detetive que pede sua ajuda em um caso de assassinato.

programme.title: A Maldiçāo do Manequim
programme.desc: Não se move, não pensa, apenas mata. Para uma jovem, um encontro casual com essa entidade sobrenatural é devastador. Frankie descobre que, uma vez que ela veja o manequim, pode não haver fim à vista, exceto o dela.

programme.title: O 3º andar: Terror na Rua Malasaña
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, uma família muda-se para Madri em busca do sonho da cidade grande. Na nova casa, eles descobrirão que não estão sozinhos. Baseado em uma história real.

programme.title: Alta Pressão
programme.desc: Enquanto em um hospital psiquiátrico, uma das estudantes de psicologia, Abby, tem um encontro assustador com um paciente de alto risco, Harmon. Mais tarde, Harmon escapa do hospital deixando um rastro de morte e procurando por Abby.

programme.title: Uma Foto Antes de Morrer
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos se envolve em uma colisão entre um veado e um veículo na zona rural da Rússia. Em busca de ajuda, eles se deparam com uma cabana, onde encontram uma foto que retrata o acidente.

programme.title: Colheita Maldita: Gênesis
programme.desc: Um jovem casal tenta libertar uma criança presa, com resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: O Espelho
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmão, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenômeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: Ritual De Morte
programme.desc: Depois de receber um telefonema perturbado, um homem chega a um motel decadente à beira da estrada e descobre que sua ex-esposa matou um estranho que está conectado a um culto perigoso.

programme.title: Submersos
programme.desc: Acontecimentos estranhos ocorrem em um submarino da Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Evidências de um Crime
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profissão para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaçando a vida estável que construiu para a família.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino
programme.desc: A polícia prende um psicopata que está ligado a vários sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura será apenas o início de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vítimas.

programme.title: O Corpo
programme.desc: Holly, Cali e Mel se reúnem na véspera de Natal, na casa de Mel, para comemorar. Entediadas, Cali convence as amigas que devem ir à casa do seu tio. Na casa, Holly encontra provas que a levam a acreditar que Cali não está relacionada aos proprietários.

programme.title: Assassinato em Gosford Park
programme.desc: Na Inglaterra dos anos 30, um grupo de arrogantes ricos e famosos se reúne para um fim de semana de descanso em um resort de caça. Mas, quando ocorre um assassinato, cada um desses personagens interessantes se torna suspeito.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudança climática que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaça mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: A Tumba do Dragão
programme.desc: Travis Preston e sua equipe viajam para a China em busca de uma resposta para os misteriosos assassinatos que começam a levantar suspeitas sobre a existência de uma criatura lendária.

programme.title: Desastre das Cobras: O Ataque na Ilha das Cobras
programme.desc: Um grupo de funcionários da revista Geographic chega a uma ilha deserta no Sudeste Asiático para preparar um novo espetáculo. O líder da expedição esconde dos colegas que veio aqui para encontrar o pai, desaparecido há muitos anos.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcação militar em busca de um submersível não identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubarão gigante, forçado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Maligna
programme.desc: Mais perigosa que Hannibal Lecter, e ela só tem 9 anos... Dr. Fonda, um renomado psicólogo é chamado para atender com urgência uma jovem prodígio que está sendo detida pelo exército norte-americano.

programme.title: Outra Vida
programme.desc: Uma cientista desenvolve uma droga revolucionária que induz realidades virtuais e expande a sensação de tempo. Quando o governo tenta assumir projeto, ela precisará decidir como usar sua poderosa criação.

programme.title: Fim da Linha
programme.desc: Um guarda de segurança de shopping, e ex-agente federal antidrogas, cruza o caminho de um grande traficante de drogas após salvar uma mulher que estava em perigo.

programme.title: Guerra nas Ruas
programme.desc: Um detetive persegue policiais desonestos Para descobrir quem eles são, o detetive prova que seu sargento está armando o assassinato de dois motociclistas

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilância constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve pegá-los antes que eles o peguem.
